Reviews.Title: Good replacement phone
Reviews.Author: Millicent Martin
Reviews.Content: I like this phone. It definitely serves its purpose!! It texts and calls. Just a replacement phone just wish it had a camera.

Reviews.Title: Simple and efficient
Reviews.Author: stephane lacote
Reviews.Content: Does its job perfectly. I am using it just to place and receive calls.Charging port is microUSB standard  which is very handy as well.

Reviews.Title: good temporary replacement phone
Reviews.Author: Michael Avanzato
Reviews.Content: bought this phone as a temporary replacement while my Sony Xperia got repaired,good quality phone for the money,was expecting a junk phone but was surprised by how good it was for a classic style bar phone.pros:-picks up At&t; signal very good-clear and good volume calls-instant sending and receiving texts-built in FM radio-built in LED flash light-decent outer music/phone call speaker-good battery timecons:-very small screen,only 1.8 inches-no camera (but you can receive pictures and video through MMS)-no Internet capabilities (you can only make calls and text with this phone)-no Bluetooth-small and slightly stiff buttonsso if you're looking for a good temporary replacement or you're that type of person that doesn't care about smart phones,etc; this phone is for you.

ProductInfo.Name: Huawei G3621L 850 Black GSM DualBand Cell Phone
